Sarunas Jasikevicius threw an inbound pass to Stephen Jackson , who went around a stumbling Kyle Korver to make an uncontested shot. "I was 0-for-infinity," Stephen Jackson said. I just wanted to make a shot. We knew they'd switch. I went backdoor and got to the basket. My teammates showed confidence in me to give me the ball. It seemed like I hadn't made a shot all game. Stephen Jackson missed 15 of his first 19 shots before the easy layup. Chris Webber then missed a jumper at the buzzer after an inbound pass from Allen Iverson .
